title: Think of the Children
description: Katie and the Union give advice for asking out your bartender. Friendly banter includes wearing pajamas outside and fake eyelashes (13:08). Tim Tebow still can’t seem to catch a break (43:32). Taunting is ruining the youth (49:34). Travis thinks he’s Jamal Adams (58:01). Is Megan Rapinoe retiring? Still no (1:13:36). MLB thirst trapping on TikTok (1:16:05). Finally, what athlete should unretire and try another sport (1:25:46)?
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: Katie and the Union talk Tebow, taunting and TikTok
